briefTitle: Osteopontin in Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Osteopontin Level and Promoter Polymorphism in Egyptian Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Both pretreatment serum level of oteopontin and gene mutation were correlated with different clinicopathological criteria of the patients, response to the treatment, PFS and OS.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* de novo metastatic breast cancer patients recruited from Oncology center Mansoura University and clinical oncology department, Mansoura University Hospital All included patients were presented with disseminated visceral +/- bone metastasis (visceral crisis)

Exclusion Criteria:

* brain metastasis was excluded
